page.title: 14CREDITS
page.content: Commendation should go to: 1) Top 3 at Aldenham School, a group of 12 thirteen year olds who were responsible for researching the land and amenity cover in 8 out of the 12 squares. 2) Fairfield School,Radlett, who with Mr Paul Fowler surveyed the remaining 4 squares around their school. These were 8 year olds. 3) Simon Bloom and Toby Munyard who helped feed the information in to the computer. 4) David Mead, Head of Computing at Aldenham School,who was involved in recording the information and in giving specialised knowledge to the Domesday surveyors. 5) David Robertson of Aldenham School who was in overall charge of the project in this area.
